[
  '(:action cluster
  :parameters (?entity1 - entity ?entity2 - entity)
  :precondition (and 
                  (not (clustered ?entity1))
                  (not (clustered ?entity2))
                )
  :effect (and 
            (clustered ?entity1)
            (clustered ?entity2)
          ))',
  '(:action get
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?resource - object)
  :precondition (and
                  (not (collected ?resource))
                  (source_of ?resource)
                )
  :effect (collected ?resource)
)',
  '(:action start
  :parameters (?actor - entity ?resource - object ?location - place)
  :precondition (and 
                  (available ?actor) 
                  (at ?actor ?location)
                  (clustered ?resource)
                  (not (started ?resource ?location))
                )
  :effect (started ?resource ?location)
)',
  '(:action break
  :parameters (?entity - entity ?object - object)
  :precondition (and (not (broken ?object)))
  :effect (broken ?object)
)',
  '(:action build
  :parameters (?builder - entity ?location - place ?structure - structure_type ?resource - resource_type)
  :precondition (and
                  (not (built ?structure))
                  (available ?builder)
                  (available ?resource)
                  (at ?builder ?location)
                  (prepared ?resource ?structure)
                )
  :effect (and
           (built ?structure)
           (not (available ?resource))
          ))',
  '(:action burn
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?combustible - object ?context - context)
  :precondition (and
                  (not (burned ?combustible))
                  (fire_started ?context)
                  (can_interact ?agent ?combustible)
                )
  :effect (burned ?combustible)
)'
]
